amendment.description: To include a provision relating to the payment of annual charges.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3391 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3391 proposed by Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S4809; text: CR S4809) To include a provision relating to the payment of annual charges.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3391 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
